predicate.note: Frames file for 'explore' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No access to verbnet. No comparison.

roleset.name: explore, discover new places or things

example.name: exploring options
example.text: The action followed by one day an Intelogic announcement that it will retain an investment banker *trace* to explore alternatives ``to maximize shareholder value,'' including the possible sale of the company.
example.arg: alternatives ``to maximize shareholder value,'' including the possible sale of the company

roleset.note: They pretty much all look about like that.
